N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7024.2 - Congregate religious activities

State Regulations
(a) Consistent with the requirements of
section
7024.1
(b) of this

Part, all prisoners shall be permitted to congregate for the purpose of
religious worship and other religious activities. (b) Each facility shall provide all prisoners
access to an appropriate area for congregate religious worship and other
religious activities. This area shall be made available to prisoners in
accordance with the tenets of their religion, at times not unduly disruptive of
facility routine. Notes
